days.title: Rose Day ğŸŒ¹
days.message: On this Rose Day, I want to say you are very special to me. Like a rose makes everything beautiful, you make my life happy. This rose is a small sign of my love and care for you. ğŸ’–

days.title: Propose Day ğŸ’
days.message: On this Propose Day, I want to tell you what my heart feels. You are very special to me, and I want you in my life always. Will you be mine and walk with me forever? ğŸ’–

days.title: Chocolate Day ğŸ«
days.message: On this Chocolate Day, I want to make your day a little sweet. Just like chocolate, your smile makes my life happy. This chocolate is a small sign of my love for you. ğŸ’–

days.title: Teddy Day ğŸ§¸
days.message: On this Teddy Day, I feel you like a soft teddy hugs. Teddy gives comfort, your presence makes me feel safe and happy. This teddy is a small sign of my care and love for you. ğŸ’–

days.title: Promise Day ğŸ¤
days.message: On this Promise Day, I promise to always care for you and respect you. I will stand by you in every happy and hard time. This promise comes from my heart, just for you. ğŸ’–

days.title: Hug Day ğŸ¤—
days.message: On this Hug Day, I want to send you a warm hug. May this hug make you feel loved, safe, and happy.I am always here for you, with love in my heart. ğŸ’–

days.title: Kiss Day ğŸ’‹
days.message: On this Kiss Day, I want to send you a sweet kiss. A kiss to show how much I care and love you. May it make you feel special and close to my heart. ğŸ’–

days.title: Valentines Day â¤ï¸
days.message: Happy Valentines Day! You make my life happier and more beautiful every day.I am grateful to have you in my life, and I love you from my heart. ğŸ’–
